name: Ankle Mobility Drills
description: Essential for runners, walkers, and anyone with knee/hip issues. Poor ankle mobility causes compensation patterns up the chain.

exercises.name: Ankle Circles
exercises.instructions: Seated or standing. Lift one foot, draw circles with toes. 30s clockwise, 30s counter-clockwise. Switch feet.

exercises.name: Wall Ankle Dorsiflexion
exercises.instructions: Face wall, place one foot forward. Drive knee over toes toward wall without lifting heel. Feel stretch in calf/Achilles. Critical for squat depth.

exercises.name: Heel Walks + Toe Walks
exercises.instructions: Walk 20 steps on heels (toes up). Walk 20 steps on toes (heels up). Alternate. Strengthens and mobilizes ankles.

exercises.name: Bent-Knee Calf Stretch (Soleus)
exercises.instructions: Stand facing wall. Step one foot back, bend both knees. Keep back heel down. Targets soleus (deep calf) and improves ankle flexion.
